Zn-XES Kbeta and VTC 
1molal ZnCl2 + 2 molal NaCl loaded in PEEK cell mounted in temp stage, at 25C, long scans to see the change in counts due to bubble formation and if degassing works
Ge555, Pd target, det offset = 0.15
35kV 2.0 mA
***************************
